text: How does Python's lack of static typing affect maintainability and extensibility in larger projects?
After reading this very informative (albeit somewhat argumentative) question I would like to know your experience with programming large projects with Python.
Do things become un manageable as the project becomes larger?
This concern is one thing that keeps me attached to Java.
I would therefore be particularly interested in informed comparisons of maintainability and extensibility of Java and Python for large projects.

childList.text: this very informative (albeit somewhat argumentative) question
